attributes.action: Release Mr Green, MP for Ashford Kent, as he has done nothing wrong!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Green has been wrongly arrested, under terrorist laws. He is not a terrorist, and has simply made public information, that he, as an Mp, deems necessary for the publics good!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
